info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:12PM EDT until September 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Oneida County in central New York... Southeastern Madison County in central New York... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 612 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Solsville, or 7 miles north of Hamilton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kirkland, Westmoreland, Paris, Hamilton, New York Mills, Morrisville, Stockbridge, Augusta, Clinton, and New Hartford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
